## RestSinkConfigService.(constructor)

Creates instance of `RestSinkConfigService`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(secondsToFlushAfter?: number, flushAfterNumberOfLogs?: number, immediateFlushMinLevel?: LogEventLevel, restrictToLevel?: LogEventLevel);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  secondsToFlushAfter | number | Number of seconds after which should be flush called |
|  flushAfterNumberOfLogs | number | Number of logs after which should be flush called |
|  immediateFlushMinLevel | LogEventLevel | Minimal log level that will be flushed immediately |
|  restrictToLevel | LogEventLevel | Minimal log level to be displayed |
